tool.name: Tile Paramak
tool.description: Parametric Reactor Geometry Creator to vary tile thickness
tool.command: mkdir ./matplotlib && export MPLCONFIGDIR=./matplotlib && python3 '$__tool_directory__/tile_paramak.py' '$Config' && mv dagmc.h5m '$h5m_Geometry_Output' && mv vessel.stp '$stp_Geometry_Output'

param.name: Config
param.label: Config
param.help: Parametric input for tile paramak geometry creation. Format: JSON

data.name: h5m_Geometry_Output
data.label: h5m_Geometry_Output
data.help: CAD file for use in OpenMC neutroncis simulations. Format: h5m

data.name: stp_Geometry_Output
data.label: stp_Geometry_Output
data.help: CAD file for use in PINN heat flow simulations. Format: stp

tool.help: This tool takes a set of parameters and outputs a geometry ready for simulation in OpenMC and modulus PINN.
